name: X-Wing Game
description:
My very first school project

Space action game where you are the captain of X-Wing

  • "One button game" -> only thing you need is your SpaceBar
  • Full of dangerous green glowing droids, beware...
  • Cute colored energy capsules. Collecting these will be THE dream
  • Short and repeatable

v1.1 

  • Visual rework for enemies and obstacles
  • Pause game from "Esc"
  • Randomized asteroid field
  • Added visual effect for asteroid collision
  • Fixed speed variable to be more logical

v1.13

  • Fixed pause game bug
  • Added randomized asteroid field to Main menu scree

v1.14

  • Changed the function and name of Exit Button to go back to Main Menu instead of quiting application

v1.15

  • Made a few more buttons to Main Menu
  • Added a background to Main Menu make reading more eyefriendly
